segments.text: Good afternoon . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm an athlete for the Olympic Games here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About half an hour ago I fell on the ground and hurt my leg . It bled a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me have a look . You're very lucky because the cut is not deep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , I'll clean up the wound and then dress it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Must I stop all my training ? Will I be able to attend the games ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy . It's not serious . You should keep the wound very clean .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't do strenuous exercises until your wound is healed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . You'll be OK soon .
segments.speaker: S1
